cause.description:
People today don't realize how bad of a problem underaged drinking is. Alcohol is all around us and introduced to us at a young age, and because we grow up in the society where it seems almost normal, no one takes it to be a problem. What people don't realize is the dangers of underaged drinking, the risks, the hazards, and the deaths. there's a reason why the law is 21, and this is what this group is out to enforce. We are here to spread awarness and to make this world a better place, because if we wont, who will?
1. Underage drinking must come to an end.
cause.mission: spread awareness of the dangers of underaged drinking
cause.name: Stop Underage Drinking
